participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and practical, Jake has a strong sense of responsibility and enjoys creating things with his hands.
participant_1.background: i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. my cats are very special to me.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Charismatic and adventurous, George has an eclectic taste in food and a unique lifestyle as a bee farmer.
participant_2.background: my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i'm close to. i am a bee farmer. my name is george.
